title: 合并二叉树 (Merge Two Binary Trees)
content: 思路: // @Title: 合并二叉树 (Merge Two Binary Trees) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-16 00:57:04 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 44.1 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public TreeNode mergeTrees(TreeNode root1, TreeNode root2) { if(root1==null||root2==null){ return root1==null?root2:root1; } TreeNode root=new TreeNode(root1.val+root2.val); root.left=mergeTrees(root1.left,root2.left); root.right=mergeTrees(root1.right,root2.right); return root; } }
